IMDB Sentiment Analysis Results

1. Ultra Basic:

BATCH_SIZE = 128
MAX_WORDS_IN_REVIEW = 200
EMBEDDING_SIZE = 50
Network: 1 layer LSTM size 100 (dropout) + 1 FC
Learning rate = 1e-3
Iterations = 20000
Validation accuracies:
	Chkpt	%
	2000	0.5947916666666667
	5000	0.6359375
	6000	0.6989583333333333
	7000	0.6932291666666667
	8000	0.690625
	9000	0.6911458333333333
	10000	0.6901041666666666
	11000	0.6875


2. 2 layer LSTM

BATCH_SIZE = 50
MAX_WORDS_IN_REVIEW = 250
EMBEDDING_SIZE = 50
Network: 2 layer LSTM size 50 + 1 FC
Learning rate = 1e-4
Iterations = 20000
Validation accuracies:
	Chkpt	%
	500		0.5260000035166741
	1000	0.534000002592802
	1500	0.5264999989420176
	2000	0.5360000021755695
	2500	0.5530000001192092
	3000	0.5670000031590462
	3500	0.5770000010728836
	4000	0.5035000024363399
	4500	0.5224999990314245


3. 2 layer lstm v2

BATCH_SIZE = 50
MAX_WORDS_IN_REVIEW = 250
EMBEDDING_SIZE = 50
Network: 2 layer LSTM size 50 + 1 FC
Learning rate = 1e-3
Iterations = 20000
Validation accuracies:
	Chkpt	%
	1000	0.5140000002458691
	2000	0.5375000044703484
	3000	0.5434999980032444
Again, doesn't seem to be using the stacked lstm properly

4. conv then lstm

BATCH_SIZE = 50
MAX_WORDS_IN_REVIEW = 250
EMBEDDING_SIZE = 50
Network: 1d conv (same pad, pool) + LSTM (dropout) + FC
    OUTPUT_SIZE = 2
    CNN_FILTERS = 32
    FILTER_SIZE = 3
    LSTM_SIZE = 100
    LEARN_RATE = 1e-3
    Iterations = 20000

	15000	0.6965000033378601
	16000	0.6720000028610229

Network: 1d conv (same pad, pool) + LSTM (dropout) + FC

    CNN_FILTERS = 32
    FILTER_SIZE = 3
    LSTM_SIZE = 100
    LEARN_RATE = 1e-3
